value.name: A conversation at a Phoenix barbershop: 'Finally, for once, somebody has got justice'
value.description: Nuriddin said the verdict had left her in disbelief, in large part due to her own experience with a police killing. In December 2014, her cousin, 34-year-old Rumain Brisbon, was killed by a ...

value.name: America uprising: Scholars reflect on the death of George Floyd. Plus, 10 tips for journalists covering protests against police violence.
value.description: Nearly a dozen scholars on policing, economic and health inequality and media narratives reflect on the death of George Floyd in Minneapolis.

value.name: New York police promise to rebuild trust as protests continue
value.description: Protesters demanded that police release the name of the officer involved in the fatal shooting of 34-year-old Rumain Brisbon, a man police suspected of selling drugs.

value.name: 110 Black Men And Boys Killed By Police

value.name: Phoenix police shooting is latest to ignite outcry
